June 20, 1950
Richard B. Hull, Pres*
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
WOI, Iowa State College
Ames, Iowa
Dear Mr. Hull:
Thank you very much for your letter of June 13,
and I am encouraged that you have forwarded the
material to Seymour Siegel.
The American public knows so little about the
Middle East, and the Middle East plays such an imÂ¬
portant strategic role in all our efforts to create
world peace, that all efforts to provide authentic
first-hand information to leadership groups within
the American public are well worth whatever efforts
are required.
Thank you again for your cooperation.
Sincer
Director
